channel.description: how do i make it so they drop random things i only know how to make them drop 1 item..like make them drop random stuff each time you kill them

item.title: Making npcs drop more then 1 thing
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

well array is good way… drops.cfg is a better way much easier to handle too

and the not recommanded way would be

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) {
ItemHandler.addItem(####, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

ItemHandler.addItem(####, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
fyi that 1 is the amount to drop if lets say it was coins you would put 940 to drop 940 coins or noted items…

works too…

to add random drops in the way above would be hard it would be like

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) {
int rnddrop = misc.random(99);  //0 - 99 number.. random picked
if(rnddrop == 1) { //number randomly picked was 1
    ItemHandler.addItem(####, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
  } else if(rnddrop == 43) { //number randomly picked was 43..
    ItemHandler.addItem(####, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
  } else { //number that was picked is not 1 or 43 its something else.. drop like bones? or whatever
    ItemHandler.addItem(####, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
  } 
}

Read full topic

item.source: Making npcs drop more then 1 thing

item.title: Making npcs drop more then 1 thing
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

delta:

how do i make it so they drop random things i only know how to make them drop 1 item…like make them drop random stuff each time you kill them

In your drops.cfg, you have to add all of the items and amounts that you wish to have dropped randomly. In simpler terms, add other items to be dropped.

The first number is the Item ID, and the second number is the Amount of that item. Remember, you must be in drops.cfg.

Read full topic

item.description:
@zauruke wrote:

you have to go to your server folder and go into item, item2, or item3… and when you see the name of the npc and stuff like 445,445,445 erase the numers and put the number code of the items where the 445,445,445 or whatever number(you do not need more then 1 code for each items.)
